title: [Gameplay] Jhin Visual Bug
body:
The bullets of _**High Noon Jhin's**_ ult only rendered on my screen about half the time he used his ult. I could not see the bullet travel, but the impact animation rendered when it hit me and my allies. 

I've only seen it happen in the one game, but I cant really try to reproduce it as it was the enemy jhin. 
It was the_ **High Noon skin**_.
It only happens sometimes, but it makes it impossible to play around. 

I dont know if this helps, but i was playing as river spirit nami, our adc was classic kogmaw, and the enemy support was classic morgana.

replies.body: I've encountered this with his default skin, too; as a headsup/note.

Hey VEB27 - 

Thanks for the report! I'm not able to get a repro on this one. :c If you run into this issue again, please ping this thread and we can investigate further!
